name: Principal Air Ltd.
about: Principal Air Ltd., located in Abbotsford, British Columbia, is a premier flight training center and charter service operator. With over 20 years of experience, we pride ourselves on providing superior customer service and a friendly, supportive environment. Our aircraft are well-maintained to the highest standards, and our instructors, including a Class 1 CFI with over 10,000 hours of teaching time, ensure high-quality instruction. We offer fixed-wing flight training, scenic flights, charter flights, and pilot supplies. Our commitment to honesty and integrity makes us a trusted choice for aspiring pilots. At Principal Air, students are treated like family, and we look forward to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Instrument Rating (IR)
Night Rating"]
